page.title: 08BURLEIGH FARM,MALBOROUGH (2)
page.content: In the summer the cows eat grass but in the winter they give them hay and silage.On the farm they use two dogs.They have to do a lot of jobs including feeding the dogs,chickens, cows and themselves.The farm was formed about{200 years}ago from a large estate.They say the best thing about working on a farm is the fresh air.Every year they get about{65} calves.Seven years ago the people on the farm lit a{bonfire}or{fire beacon to mark the Queens Jubilee.Originally they were lit to warn the country of the arrival of the{Spanish Armada. They have a field at the top of{Pennys {Hill}called the{Beacon Field}.That was where they lit the Beacon.
